Paul<S>3972</S>, a servant<S>1401</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, called<S>2822</S> to be an apostle<S>652</S>, separated<S>873</S> unto<S>1519</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of God<S>2316</S>,
(Which<S>3739</S> he had promised afore<S>4279</S> by<S>1223</S> his<S>846</S> prophets<S>4396</S> in<S>1722</S> the holy<S>40</S> scriptures<S>1124</S>,)
Concerning<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, which<S>3588</S> was made<S>1096</S> of<S>1537</S> the seed<S>4690</S> of David<S>1138</S> according<S>2596</S> to the flesh<S>4561</S>;
And declared<S>3724</S> to be the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S> with<S>1722</S> power<S>1411</S>, according<S>2596</S> to the spirit<S>4151</S> of holiness<S>42</S>, by<S>1537</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> from the dead<S>3498</S>: <sup>declared: Gr. determined</sup>
By<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> we have received<S>2983</S> grace<S>5485</S> and<S>2532</S> apostleship<S>651</S>, for<S>1519</S> obedience<S>5218</S> to the faith<S>4102</S> among<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S>, for<S>5228</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>: <sup>for obedience: or, to the obedience of faith</sup>
Among<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> are<S>2075</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> the called<S>2822</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>:
To all<S>3956</S> that be<S>5607</S> in<S>1722</S> Rome<S>4516</S>, beloved<S>27</S> of God<S>2316</S>, called<S>2822</S> to be saints<S>40</S>: Grace<S>5485</S> to you<S>5213</S> and<S>2532</S> peace<S>1515</S> from<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
First<S>4412</S> <S>3303</S>, I thank<S>2168</S> my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S> through<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> for<S>5228</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>, that<S>3754</S> your<S>5216</S> faith<S>4102</S> is spoken<S>2605</S> of throughout<S>1722</S> the whole<S>3650</S> world<S>2889</S>.
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> witness<S>3144</S>, whom<S>3739</S> I serve<S>3000</S> with<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> spirit<S>4151</S> in<S>1722</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S>, that<S>5613</S> without ceasing<S>89</S> I make<S>4160</S> mention<S>3417</S> of you<S>5216</S> always<S>3842</S> in<S>1909</S> my<S>3450</S> prayers<S>4335</S>; <sup>with: or, in</sup>
Making request<S>1189</S>, if by any means<S>1513</S> now<S>2235</S> at length<S>4218</S> I might have a prosperous journey<S>2137</S> by<S>1722</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S> to come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I long<S>1971</S> to see<S>1492</S> you<S>5209</S>, that<S>2443</S> I may impart<S>3330</S> unto you<S>5213</S> some<S>5100</S> spiritual<S>4152</S> gift<S>5486</S>, to the end<S>1519</S> ye<S>5209</S> may be established<S>4741</S>;
That<S>1161</S> <S>5124</S> is<S>2076</S>, that I may be comforted together<S>4837</S> with<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> by<S>1223</S> <S>1722</S> the mutual<S>240</S> faith<S>4102</S> both<S>5037</S> of you<S>5216</S> and<S>2532</S> me<S>1700</S>. <sup>with: or, in</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> I would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> have<S>50</S> you<S>5209</S> ignorant<S>50</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, that<S>3754</S> oftentimes<S>4178</S> I purposed<S>4388</S> to come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, (but<S>2532</S> was let<S>2967</S> hitherto<S>891</S> <S>1204</S>,) that<S>2443</S> I might have<S>2192</S> some<S>5100</S> fruit<S>2590</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> also<S>2532</S>, even as<S>2531</S> <S>2532</S> among<S>1722</S> other<S>3062</S> Gentiles<S>1484</S>. <sup>among: or, in</sup>
I am<S>1510</S> debtor<S>3781</S> both<S>5037</S> to the Greeks<S>1672</S>, and<S>2532</S> to the Barbarians<S>915</S>; both<S>5037</S> to the wise<S>4680</S>, and<S>2532</S> to the unwise<S>453</S>.
So<S>3779</S>, as much as<S>2596</S> in me is<S>1691</S>, I am ready<S>4289</S> to preach the gospel<S>2097</S> to you<S>5213</S> that are at<S>1722</S> Rome<S>4516</S> also<S>2532</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I am<S>1870</S> not<S>3756</S> ashamed<S>1870</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is<S>2076</S> the power<S>1411</S> of God<S>2316</S> unto<S>1519</S> salvation<S>4991</S> to every one<S>3956</S> that believeth<S>4100</S>; to the Jew<S>2453</S> first<S>4412</S>, and<S>5037</S> also<S>2532</S> to the Greek<S>1672</S>.
For<S>1063</S> therein<S>1722</S> <S>846</S> is<S>601</S> the righteousness<S>1343</S> of God<S>2316</S> revealed<S>601</S> from<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S> to<S>1519</S> faith<S>4102</S>: as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>,<S>1161</S> The just<S>1342</S> shall live<S>2198</S> by<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the wrath<S>3709</S> of God<S>2316</S> is revealed<S>601</S> from<S>575</S> heaven<S>3772</S> against<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> ungodliness<S>763</S> and<S>2532</S> unrighteousness<S>93</S> of men<S>444</S>, who hold<S>2722</S> the truth<S>225</S> in<S>1722</S> unrighteousness<S>93</S>;
Because<S>1360</S> that which may be known<S>1110</S> of God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> manifest<S>5318</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>; for<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> hath shewed<S>5319</S> it unto them<S>846</S>. <sup>in them: or, to them</sup>
For<S>1063</S> the invisible things<S>517</S> of him<S>846</S> from<S>575</S> the creation<S>2937</S> of the world<S>2889</S> are clearly seen<S>2529</S>, being understood<S>3539</S> by the things that are made<S>4161</S>, even <S>5037</S> his<S>846</S> eternal<S>126</S> power<S>1411</S> and<S>2532</S> Godhead<S>2305</S>; so<S>1519</S> that they<S>846</S> are<S>1511</S> without excuse<S>379</S>: <sup>so: or, that they may be</sup>
Because<S>1360</S> that, when they knew<S>1097</S> God<S>2316</S>, they glorified<S>1392</S> him not<S>3756</S> as<S>5613</S> God<S>2316</S>, neither<S>2228</S> were thankful<S>2168</S>; but<S>235</S> became vain<S>3154</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> imaginations<S>1261</S>, and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> foolish<S>801</S> heart<S>2588</S> was darkened<S>4654</S>.
Professing themselves<S>5335</S> to be<S>1511</S> wise<S>4680</S>, they became fools<S>3471</S>,
And<S>2532</S> changed<S>236</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of the uncorruptible<S>862</S> God<S>2316</S> into<S>1722</S> an image<S>1504</S> made like<S>3667</S> to corruptible<S>5349</S> man<S>444</S>, and<S>2532</S> to birds<S>4071</S>, and<S>2532</S> fourfooted beasts<S>5074</S>, and<S>2532</S> creeping things<S>2062</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S> God<S>2316</S> also<S>2532</S> gave<S>3860</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>3860</S> to<S>1519</S> uncleanness<S>167</S> through<S>1722</S> the lusts<S>1939</S> of their own<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S>, to dishonour<S>818</S> their own<S>846</S> bodies<S>4983</S> between<S>1722</S> themselves<S>1438</S>:
Who<S>3748</S> changed<S>3337</S> the truth<S>225</S> of God<S>2316</S> into<S>1722</S> a lie<S>5579</S>, and<S>2532</S> worshipped<S>4573</S> and<S>2532</S> served<S>3000</S> the creature<S>2937</S> more than<S>3844</S> the Creator<S>2936</S>, who<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> blessed<S>2128</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>more: or, rather</sup>
For<S>1223</S> this<S>5124</S> cause God<S>2316</S> gave<S>3860</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>3860</S> unto<S>1519</S> vile<S>819</S> affections<S>3806</S>: for<S>1063</S> even<S>5037</S> their<S>846</S> women<S>2338</S> did change<S>3337</S> the natural<S>5446</S> use<S>5540</S> into<S>1519</S> that which is against<S>3844</S> nature<S>5449</S>:
And<S>5037</S> likewise<S>3668</S> also<S>2532</S> the men<S>730</S>, leaving<S>863</S> the natural<S>5446</S> use<S>5540</S> of the woman<S>2338</S>, burned<S>1572</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> lust<S>3715</S> one toward another<S>1519</S> <S>240</S>; men<S>730</S> with<S>1722</S> men<S>730</S> working<S>2716</S> that which is unseemly<S>808</S>, and<S>2532</S> receiving<S>618</S> in<S>1722</S> themselves<S>1438</S> that recompence<S>489</S> of their<S>846</S> error<S>4106</S> which<S>3739</S> was meet<S>1163</S>.
And<S>2532</S> even as<S>2531</S> they did<S>1381</S> not<S>3756</S> like<S>1381</S> to retain<S>2192</S> God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> their knowledge<S>1922</S>, God<S>2316</S> gave<S>3860</S> them<S>846</S> over<S>3860</S> to<S>1519</S> a reprobate<S>96</S> mind<S>3563</S>, to do<S>4160</S> those things which are<S>2520</S> not<S>3361</S> convenient<S>2520</S>; <sup>to retain: or, to acknowledge</sup> <sup>a reprobate: or, a mind void of judgment or, an unapproving mind</sup>
Being filled with<S>4137</S> all<S>3956</S> unrighteousness<S>93</S>, fornication<S>4202</S>, wickedness<S>4189</S>, covetousness<S>4124</S>, maliciousness<S>2549</S>; full<S>3324</S> of envy<S>5355</S>, murder<S>5408</S>, debate<S>2054</S>, deceit<S>1388</S>, malignity<S>2550</S>; whisperers<S>5588</S>,
Backbiters<S>2637</S>, haters of God<S>2319</S>, despiteful<S>5197</S>, proud<S>5244</S>, boasters<S>213</S>, inventors<S>2182</S> of evil things<S>2556</S>, disobedient<S>545</S> to parents<S>1118</S>,
Without understanding<S>801</S>, covenantbreakers<S>802</S>, without natural affection<S>794</S>, implacable<S>786</S>, unmerciful<S>415</S>: <sup>without natural: or unsociable</sup>
Who<S>3748</S> knowing<S>1921</S> the judgment<S>1345</S> of God<S>2316</S>, that<S>3754</S> they which commit<S>4238</S> such things<S>5108</S> are<S>1526</S> worthy<S>514</S> of death<S>2288</S>, not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> do<S>4160</S> the same<S>846</S>, but<S>235</S> <S>2532</S> have pleasure<S>4909</S> in them that do<S>4238</S> them. <sup>have: or, consent with</sup>
